ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 8 P-cores x 8 FP32/cycle (AVX2 256-bit) x 2 (FMA) x 2 FMA units = 256 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 8 P-cores x 4 FP64/cycle (AVX2) x 2 (FMA) x 2 FMA units = 128 FP64 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 8 P-cores x 32 INT8/cycle (AVX2) x 2 x 2 = 1024 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (5000 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: 8 Golden Cove P-cores + 4 Gracemont E-cores. P-cores have AVX2 (256-bit) with 2 FMA units. E-cores limited to 128-bit SIMD.
